Hi,
as I understood, the innovation number that is assigned to each genome =
is valid only to run neat on one computer. For example, if i run neat on th=
e same problem on different computers at the same time, the results each wi=
ll produce, will not be genetically compatible , is that correct? Because i=
f one computer names link node139->node293 as gene #422, another may name i=
t as gene #12102. So, in order to run neat, say, on 3 computers, I will hav=
e to change the function that generates innovation number:
//Return last in=
novation number in Genome
double Genome::get_last_gene_innovnum() {
  retur=
n ((*(genes.rbegin()))->innovation_num)+1;
}
to shared among all computers =
and give a unique innovation number for any computer in the set.
I am corre=
ct?

Thanks to all in advance.
